item.title: PHP-in-London list
item.description: While Twitter can be really annoying, sometimes it can help to promote some wonderfully simple ideas. One of these came from Andrew Woods (@awoods) - a github repo called php-in-seattle. It's a simple idea - just a list of companies around a geographical area that use PHP. What it can enable is of mutual advantage to the companies, and developers that might be looking for a new job. So, I started a similar list for the London (UK) area.
